name: 모멘텀 돌파 전략
description: 고변동·거래량 급증 시 20봉 최고가 돌파 매매
buy_formula_levels: EMA(5) > EMA(20) and EMA(20) > EMA(60) and ATR(14) >= 0.03 and Vol(0) >= MA(Vol,20) * 1.5 and Strength >= 110 and Close <= MaxHigh20 * 1.003
EMA(5) > EMA(20) and EMA(20) > EMA(60) and ATR(14) >= 0.035 and Vol(0) >= MA(Vol,20) * 1.8 and Strength >= 120 and Close <= MaxHigh20 * 1.0015
EMA(5) > EMA(20) and EMA(20) > EMA(60) and ATR(14) >= 0.04 and Vol(0) >= MA(Vol,20) * 2.0 and Strength >= 130 and Close <= MaxHigh20 * 1.001
sell_formula_levels: Close >= Entry * 1.04 or Close <= Peak * 0.98 or Close <= Entry * 0.98 or RSI(14) < 45 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)
Close >= Entry * 1.02 or Close <= Peak * 0.988 or Close <= Entry * 0.99 or RSI(14) < 55 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)
Close >= Entry * 1.015 or Close <= Peak * 0.992 or Close <= Entry * 0.993 or RSI(14) < 60 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)

name: 조정 매수 전략
description: 상승 추세 중 단기 조정 시 매수 진입하는 전략
buy_formula_levels: EMA(20) > EMA(60) and EMA(5) < EMA(20) and RSI(14) <= 40 and ATR(14) <= 0.04 and Strength >= 95
EMA(20) > EMA(60) and EMA(5) < EMA(20) and RSI(14) <= 30 and ATR(14) <= 0.03 and Strength >= 100
EMA(20) > EMA(60) and EMA(5) < EMA(20) and RSI(14) <= 25 and ATR(14) <= 0.025 and Strength >= 105
sell_formula_levels: Close >= Entry * 1.04 or Close <= Peak * 0.98 or Close <= Entry * 0.98 or RSI(14) < 45 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)
Close >= Entry * 1.02 or Close <= Peak * 0.988 or Close <= Entry * 0.99 or RSI(14) < 55 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)
Close >= Entry * 1.015 or Close <= Peak * 0.992 or Close <= Entry * 0.993 or RSI(14) < 60 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)

name: 추세 추종 전략
description: 강한 상승 추세에서 가격 조정이 거의 없는 종목을 추세 지속 관점으로 매수하는 전략
buy_formula_levels: EMA(5) > EMA(20) and EMA(20) > EMA(60) and RSI(14) > 50 and (MaxHigh5 - MinLow5) / MinLow5 <= 0.05 and ATR(14) >= 0.02 and Strength >= 100
EMA(5) > EMA(20) and EMA(20) > EMA(60) and RSI(14) > 55 and (MaxHigh5 - MinLow5) / MinLow5 <= 0.03 and ATR(14) >= 0.025 and Strength >= 110
EMA(5) > EMA(20) and EMA(20) > EMA(60) and RSI(14) > 60 and (MaxHigh5 - MinLow5) / MinLow5 <= 0.01 and ATR(14) >= 0.03 and Strength >= 120
sell_formula_levels: Close >= Entry * 1.04 or Close <= Peak * 0.98 or Close <= Entry * 0.98 or RSI(14) < 45 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)
Close >= Entry * 1.02 or Close <= Peak * 0.988 or Close <= Entry * 0.99 or RSI(14) < 55 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)
Close >= Entry * 1.015 or Close <= Peak * 0.992 or Close <= Entry * 0.993 or RSI(14) < 60 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)

name: 추세 반전 전략
description: 장기 하락 추세 종목의 저점 부근에서 RSI 다이버전스와 지지선 형성 등을 근거로 추세 반등을 노리는 전략
buy_formula_levels: EMA(120) < EMA(120,-1) and Close <= MinLow120 * 1.03 and RSI(14,-1) < RSI(14) and Close > Open
EMA(120) < EMA(120,-1) and Close <= MinLow120 * 1.02 and RSI(14,-1) < RSI(14) and Close > Open
EMA(120,-1) <= EMA(120) and Close <= MinLow120 * 1.05 and RSI(14,-2) < RSI(14) and Close > EMA(20)
sell_formula_levels: Close >= Entry * 1.04 or Close <= Peak * 0.98 or Close <= Entry * 0.98 or RSI(14) < 45 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)
Close >= Entry * 1.02 or Close <= Peak * 0.988 or Close <= Entry * 0.99 or RSI(14) < 55 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)
Close >= Entry * 1.015 or Close <= Peak * 0.992 or Close <= Entry * 0.993 or RSI(14) < 60 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)

name: 거래량 돌파 전략

buy_formula_levels: Vol(0) >= MA(Vol,20) * 2.0 and Close > Close(-5) and EMA(5) > EMA(20) and RSI(14) > 50
Vol(0) >= MA(Vol,20) * 3.0 and Close >= MaxHigh120 * 0.98 and EMA(5) > EMA(20) and RSI(14) > 55
Vol(0) >= MA(Vol,20) * 4.0 and Close >= MaxHigh120 and EMA(5) > EMA(20) and EMA(20) > EMA(60) and RSI(14) > 60
sell_formula_levels: Close >= Entry * 1.04 or Close <= Peak * 0.98 or Close <= Entry * 0.98 or RSI(14) < 45 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)
Close >= Entry * 1.02 or Close <= Peak * 0.988 or Close <= Entry * 0.99 or RSI(14) < 55 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)
Close >= Entry * 1.015 or Close <= Peak * 0.992 or Close <= Entry * 0.993 or RSI(14) < 60 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)

name: 이평선 정배열 추세 전략
description: 다수 기간 EMA가 상승 정배열로 진행 중인 강한 추세 종목을 대상, 단기 조정 시 매수 진입하는 전략
buy_formula_levels: EMA(5) > EMA(20) and EMA(20) > EMA(60) and EMA(5,-1) > EMA(5) and RSI(14) > 50 and Vol(0) >= MA(Vol,20)
EMA(5) > EMA(20) and EMA(20) > EMA(60) and Close >= EMA(20) * 0.98 and RSI(14) > 55 and Vol(0) >= MA(Vol,20)
EMA(5) > EMA(20) and EMA(20) > EMA(60) and Close >= EMA(5) and RSI(14) > 60 and Vol(0) >= MA(Vol,20)
sell_formula_levels: Close >= Entry * 1.04 or Close <= Peak * 0.98 or Close <= Entry * 0.98 or RSI(14) < 45 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)
Close >= Entry * 1.02 or Close <= Peak * 0.988 or Close <= Entry * 0.99 or RSI(14) < 55 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)
Close >= Entry * 1.015 or Close <= Peak * 0.992 or Close <= Entry * 0.993 or RSI(14) < 60 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)

description: 장중 주가가 VWAP 부근까지 눌렸다가 다시 상향 반등할 때 매수 진입하는 전략
buy_formula_levels: EMA(20) > EMA(60) and Low(0) <= VWAP * 0.99 and Close >= VWAP and Close > Open and RSI(14) > 45
EMA(20) > EMA(60) and Low(0) <= VWAP and Close >= VWAP and Close > Open and RSI(14) > 50
EMA(20) > EMA(60) and Low(-1) <= VWAP and Close(-1) >= VWAP and Close(-1) > Open(-1) and Close > Open and RSI(14) > 55
sell_formula_levels: Close >= Entry * 1.04 or Close <= Peak * 0.98 or Close <= Entry * 0.98 or RSI(14) < 45 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)
Close >= Entry * 1.02 or Close <= Peak * 0.988 or Close <= Entry * 0.99 or RSI(14) < 55 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)
Close >= Entry * 1.015 or Close <= Peak * 0.992 or Close <= Entry * 0.993 or RSI(14) < 60 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)

name: 볼린저 밴드 반등 전략
description: 주가가 볼린저 밴드 하단을 이탈한 뒤 다시 밴드 안으로 진입하며 반등하는 경우를 노리는 전략
buy_formula_levels: Close(-1) < BB_lower(20,2,-1) and Close >= BB_lower(20,2) and RSI(14) < 30 and Vol(0) > Vol(-1) and Close > Open
Close(-1) < BB_lower(20,2,-1) and Close >= BB_lower(20,2) and RSI(14) < 25 and Vol(0) > Vol(-1) and Close > Open
Close(-2) < BB_lower(20,2,-2) and Close(-1) < BB_lower(20,2,-1) and Close >= BB_lower(20,2) and RSI(14) < 20 and Vol(0) < MA(Vol,20) and Close(-1) > Open(-1) and Close > Open
sell_formula_levels: Close >= Entry * 1.04 or Close <= Peak * 0.98 or Close <= Entry * 0.98 or RSI(14) < 45 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)
Close >= Entry * 1.02 or Close <= Peak * 0.988 or Close <= Entry * 0.99 or RSI(14) < 55 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)
Close >= Entry * 1.015 or Close <= Peak * 0.992 or Close <= Entry * 0.993 or RSI(14) < 60 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)

description: 밴드 폭이 극히 좁아진 종목에서 거래 급증과 함께 상단 밴드 돌파 흐름이 나타나는 전략
buy_formula_levels: BandWidth20 < BandWidth20(-1) and BandWidth20(-1) < BandWidth20(-2) and Close > BB_upper(20,2) and Vol(0) >= MA(Vol,20) * 2
BandWidth20 = min(BandWidth20 over last 10) and Close > BB_upper(20,2) and Vol(0) >= MA(Vol,20) * 3
BandWidth20 = min(BandWidth20 over last 20) and Close > BB_upper(20,2) and Vol(0) >= MA(Vol,20) * 4

Close >= Entry * 1.015 or Close <= Peak * 0.992 or Close <= Entry * 0.993 or RSI(14) < 60 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)

EMA(5) > EMA(20) and EMA(20) > EMA(60) and Close < EMA(5) and RSI(14) >= 50 and ATR(14) >= 0.03 and Strength >= 110
EMA(5) > EMA(20) and EMA(20) > EMA(60) and Close < EMA(5) and RSI(14) >= 55 and ATR(14) >= 0.035 and Strength >= 120

Close >= Entry * 1.02 or Close <= Peak * 0.988 or Close <= Entry * 0.99 or RSI(14) < 55 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)
Close >= Entry * 1.015 or Close <= Peak * 0.992 or Close <= Entry * 0.993 or RSI(14) < 60 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)

RSI(14,-1) < 30 and RSI(14) > 30 and (Vol(0) > Vol(-1) or Strength >= 100) and Close > Open
RSI(14,-1) < 20 and RSI(14) > 30 and Vol(0) >= MA(Vol,20) * 2 and Close >= Open * 1.01
sell_formula_levels: Close >= Entry * 1.04 or Close <= Peak * 0.98 or Close <= Entry * 0.98 or RSI(14) < 45 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)
Close >= Entry * 1.02 or Close <= Peak * 0.988 or Close <= Entry * 0.99 or RSI(14) < 55 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)
Close >= Entry * 1.015 or Close <= Peak * 0.992 or Close <= Entry * 0.993 or RSI(14) < 60 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)

BandWidth20 = min(BandWidth20 over last 20) and Close > BB_upper(20,2) and Vol(0) >= MA(Vol,20) * 3

Close >= Entry * 1.02 or Close <= Peak * 0.988 or Close <= Entry * 0.99 or RSI(14) < 55 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)
Close >= Entry * 1.015 or Close <= Peak * 0.992 or Close <= Entry * 0.993 or RSI(14) < 60 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)

name: 골든 크로스 돌파 전략
description: 단기/중기 EMA 골든크로스 발생 후 주요 저항 돌파 시 매수 진입하는 전략

EMA(5) > EMA(20) and Close >= MaxHigh60 and Vol(0) >= MA(Vol,20) * 2 and RSI(14) > 55
sell_formula_levels: DI_plus < DI_minus or ADX(14) <= 20 or Close < EMA(20) or Close >= EntryPrice * 1.10 or Close <= EntryPrice * 0.95
DI_plus < DI_minus or ADX(14) <= 20 or Close < EMA(20) or Close >= EntryPrice * 1.10 or Close <= EntryPrice * 0.95

buy_formula_levels: ATR(14) > 1.5 * MA(ATR(14),20) and EMA(20) > EMA(60) and Vol(0) > Vol(-1)
ATR(14) > 2 * MA(ATR(14),20) and EMA(20) < EMA(60) and Close > EMA(20) and Vol(0) > Vol(-1)
ATR(14) > 2.5 * MA(ATR(14),20) and EMA(20) < EMA(60) and EMA(5) > EMA(20) and Vol(0) >= MA(Vol,20) * 2

Close >= Entry * 1.02 or Close <= Peak * 0.988 or Close <= Entry * 0.99 or RSI(14) < 55 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)
Close >= Entry * 1.015 or Close <= Peak * 0.992 or Close <= Entry * 0.993 or RSI(14) < 60 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)

MACD_hist(-1) <= 0 and MACD_hist(0) > 0 and Close > MaxHigh20 and Vol(0) > Vol(-1)

sell_formula_levels: Close >= Entry * 1.04 or Close <= Peak * 0.98 or Close <= Entry * 0.98 or RSI(14) < 45 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)
Close >= Entry * 1.02 or Close <= Peak * 0.988 or Close <= Entry * 0.99 or RSI(14) < 55 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)
Close >= Entry * 1.015 or Close <= Peak * 0.992 or Close <= Entry * 0.993 or RSI(14) < 60 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)

name: MFI 과매도 반등 전략
description: MFI 지표가 과매도 영역에서 상승 반전할 때 매수 진입하는 평균회귀 반등 전략
buy_formula_levels: MFI(14) <= 20 and MFI(14,-1) < 20 and MFI(14) > 20 and Vol(0) <= MA(Vol,20) and Strength >= 105 and Close > EMA(5)
MFI(14) <= 15 and MFI(14,-1) < 15 and MFI(14) > 15 and Vol(0) <= MA(Vol,20) * 0.8 and Strength >= 110 and EMA(5) > EMA(20)
MFI(14) <= 10 and MFI(14,-1) < 10 and MFI(14) > 10 and Vol(0) <= MA(Vol,20) * 0.5 and Strength >= 120 and Close > EMA(20)
sell_formula_levels: Close >= Entry * 1.04 or Close <= Peak * 0.98 or Close <= Entry * 0.98 or RSI(14) < 45 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)
Close >= Entry * 1.02 or Close <= Peak * 0.988 or Close <= Entry * 0.99 or RSI(14) < 55 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)
Close >= Entry * 1.015 or Close <= Peak * 0.992 or Close <= Entry * 0.993 or RSI(14) < 60 or EMA(5) < EMA(20)
